name: Monolith (itch) (Jorlu)
description:
Explore a procedurally generated abstract environment that changes with your interactions, delivering different emotions in regards to yours.

Created for the Global Game Jam 2014.

Credits: 

Angel Gonzalez Parra - Art and Design

Fernando Abaroa Feijoo - Art and Design

David Castella López - Programming and Design

Jorge Luis De Alba Jaime - Programming and Design

All Sound Effects from: http://www.sampleswap.org/
